section.name: Overseas sales.
section.p: Nowadays international trading is still growing sphere of business. Even small business entities make overseas sales (export) or import.

Overseas buyer usually have not to pay foreign sales taxes. For example, foreigners travelers can refund sales taxes when they leaves the country. To implements this logic Debtor/Creditor has "Is foreigner" property. If Debtor/Creditor is foreigner then sales taxes will be omitted for both sales (foreigner buyers) and purchase (foreigner vendors).

Foreign buyers that buy goods for business purpose (e.g. for resale) usually must have translated invoice. This is required by their tax bureau. Beige-Accounting has advanced internationalization to do it. This helps foreigner buyers and may attract more of them.
